analysis.description:
OldFACEToken (/unique_chucks/42/0xa90c8f4523f89004dd106f2bc0e98ca4b138cce0.sol#98-104) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/42/0xa90c8f4523f89004dd106f2bc0e98ca4b138cce0.sol#98-99)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xa90c8f4523f89004dd106f2bc0e98ca4b138cce0.sol:
	Contract MENSA has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xa90c8f4523f89004dd106f2bc0e98ca4b138cce0.sol#237-239)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
